The couple welcomed their first child together just a few months earlier, with the TV personality sharing the happy news with an adorable photo on Instagram.

2 BACKSTORY

Jordan also shared a snap of himself cradling their daughter, which he simply captioned: "Row Renggli McGraw 2/16/21."
